Love \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w patient|strong="G3114"\w*, love \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w kind|strong="G5541"\w*. \w It|strong="G3588"\w* does \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w envy|strong="G2206"\w*, \w it|strong="G3588"\w* does \w not|strong="G3756"\w* boast, \w it|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w proud|strong="G5448"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w I|strong="G5613"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, \w I|strong="G5613"\w* \w talked|strong="G2980"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, \w I|strong="G5613"\w* \w thought|strong="G3049"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, \w I|strong="G5613"\w* \w reasoned|strong="G3049"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w child|strong="G3516"\w*. \w When|strong="G3753"\w* \w I|strong="G5613"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* man, \w I|strong="G5613"\w* \w set|strong="G5426"\w* aside \w childish|strong="G3516"\w* ways.
